All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppClient
Main entry point for the client application.
AppServer
Main entry point for the server application
AvailableLobbyMessage
Message containing the list of available lobbies.
AvailableLobbyMessage.AvailableLobbyPayload
Specific payload of the AvailableLobbyMessage
Board
Model's internal board representation
Board.BoardDeserializer
Board's custom gson deserializer
Board.BoardSerializer
Board's custom gson serializer
BoardController
The controller class for the board view in the GUI application.
BoardMessage
Message containing the Board
ChatController
The ChatController class is responsible for managing the chat functionality in the GUI.
ChatMessage
Message containing a chat message.
Client
Interface Client defines the methods that must be implemented by each client.
ClientLogger
Class ClientLogger saves log data for the client.
ClientSkeleton
ClientSkeleton used by a Socket Server to simulate RMI communication with the client.
CommonException
CommonException is the base class for all exceptions in the project.
CommonGoal
Class representing the game's common goals.
CommonGoalMessage
Message with all information for a single common goal
CommonGoalMessage.CommonGoalPayload
Specific payload of the Common Goal Message.
CommonGoalStrategy
Interface implemented by each specific type of CommonGoal instance
Coordinate
Coordinate class to index locations on the board.
CreateLobbyMessage
Message containing a request to create a lobby.
CrossGoal
Common goal strategy for the Cross goal, involving 5 tiles of the same type forming an X shape.
CurrentPlayerMessage
Message containing the current player's nickname
DebugMessage
Message pinging the server for debug purposes.
DecreasingColumnsGoal
Common goal strategy for the DecreasingColumns goal, involving 5 columns of decreasing/increasing height.
DiagonalFiveTileGoal
Common goal strategy for the DiagonalFiveTile goal, involving 5 tiles of the same type forming a diagonal.
EightUniqueGoal
Common goal strategy for the EightUnique goal, involving 8 tiles of the same type in any position.
EndgameController
The EndgameController class is responsible for managing the endgame screen in the GUI.
EndGameMessage
Message notifying the end of the game, along with the final leaderboard.
EndGameMessage.EndGamePayload
Specific payload of the EndGameMessage.
FourCornersGoal
Common goal strategy for the FourCorners goal, involving 4 tiles of the same type in the four corners of the shelf.
FourGroupFourTileGoal
Common goal strategy for the FourGroupFourTile goal, involving 4 groups of at least 4 tiles of the same type.
FourRowFiveTileGoal
Implements the FourRowFiveTileGoal goal, involving four rows of five tiles of maximum three different types.
GameController
GameController, responsible for modifying the model according to the input from the player views.
GameInterfaceController
The GameInterfaceController class is responsible for managing the game interface screen in the GUI.
GameModel
Game model class to be used as a representation of the game's state by the controller
GameModel.CGType
Disambiguation enum for the common goals
GameModel.ModelDeserializer
GameModel's' custom gson deserializer
GameModel.ModelSerializer
GameModel's custom gson serializer
GUI
The GUI class extends the View class and represents the graphical user interface of the application.
GUIApp
The GUIApp class extends the Application class and represents the main entry point for the GUI application.
GUIUtils
The GUIUtils class provides utility methods for the GUI application.
IncomingChatMessage
Message containing a chat message.
IntegrityChecks
IntegrityChecks unifies player input validation over game actions.
InvalidStringException
Exception thrown when a string is not formatted correctly.
JoinLobbyMessage
Message containing a request to join a lobby.
LobbyController
Handles registration to multiple lobbies for concurrent play.
LobbyController.Lobby
Lobby record, representing both recovery and normal lobbies.
LobbyController.LobbyView
LobbyView is a serializable version of Lobby to be sent to the client for information.
LocalClient
Class LocalClient is the main network interface for the client application.
LocalModel
Singleton local model representation used by the running view.
LocalPlayerController
The LocalPlayerController class is responsible for managing the local player's shelf and actions in the game interface.
LocalServer
Class LocalServer is the main network interface for the server application.
LoginController
The LoginController class is responsible for managing the login and lobby selection process in the game interface.
MainController
The MainController class is responsible for managing the main game interface.
ModelListener
Interface ModelListener defines the methods that must be implemented by each model listener.
ModelMessage<Payload extends Serializable>
MVC model messages parent class.
Move
Payload for MoveMessage.
MoveMessage
Message containing a player move.
OccupiedTileException
Exception thrown when a tile is inserted in an already occupied coordinate.
OtherShelfController
The OtherShelfController class is responsible for managing the display of the other player's shelves.
OutOfBoundCoordinateException
Class OutOfBoundCoordinateException is thrown when a coordinate is out of bound.
PersonalGoal
Class representing the game's personal goals.
Player
Model's internal Player representation.
Player.PlayerDeserializer
Player's custom gson deserializer
Player.PlayerSerializer
Player's custom gson serializer
RecoverLobbyMessage
Message containing a request to join recovering lobby.
ReflectionUtility
Class ReflectionUtility provides utility methods for reflection.
RequestLobbyMessage
Message containing a request to see the available lobbies.
ResourcesManager
Class ResourcesManager is responsible for all interactions with the file system and generic server resources.
ResourcesManager.GraphicalResources
Utility class to manage graphical resources used in the GUI.
ResourcesManager.JsonManager
Utility function to manage Json objects, powered by GSON.
Response
Generic response returned to each client request
Server
Interface Server defines the methods that must be implemented by each server.
ServerLogger
Class ServerLogger saves log data for the server.
ServerResponseMessage
Message containing a Response object.
ServerStub
ServerStub used by a Socket Client to simulate RMI communication with the server.
Shelf
Model's internal shelf representation
Shelf.ShelfDeserializer
Protected class that contains the gson custom deserializer logic for Shelf.
The valid Json element tree representing the object has the following structure:
Each tile is represented as its string representation (see Tile.toString()) Tile
Each column is represented as a json Array in objects each named column_i, where i is the index of the column.
The json is expected to have the structure {shelf : {
column_0 : [...],
column_1 : [...],
...
}
}
The names of the attributes are irrelevant
Shelf.ShelfSerializer
Protected class that contains the gson custom serializer logic for Shelf.
ShelfMessage
Message containing a single Shelf
SixGroupTwoTileGoal
Common goal strategy for the SixGroupTwoTile goal, involving 6 groups of at least 2 tiles of the same type.
StartGameMessage
Message notifying clients that the game has started.
StartGameMessage.PlayerRecord
Record containing the information of a player.
StartGameMessage.StartGamePayload
Specific payload of the StartGameMessage.
ThreeColumnSixTileGoal
Implements the ThreeColumnSixTileGoal goal, involving three columns of six tiles of maximum three different types.
Tile
Model's internal shelf representation.
Tile.Sprite
Enum for the different sprites of tiles in the game.
Tile.Type
Enum for the different types of tiles in the game
TileBag
Model's internal representation of the tile bag.
TileBag.TileBagDeserializer
TileBag's custom Gson Deserializer class.
TUI
Textual User Interface (TUI) class.
TUIUtils
Utility class for TUI, responsible for pretty-printing the game state.
TwoColumnDistinctGoal
Implements the TwoColumnDistinctGoal goal, involving two columns of six tiles of six different types.
TwoGroupSquareGoal
Implements the TwoGroupSquareGoal goal, involving two 2x2 squares of tiles of the same type.
TwoRowDistinctGoal
Implements the TwoRowDistinctGoal goal, involving two rows of five tiles of five different types.
UpdateScoreMessage
Message notifying the clients of a score update
UpdateScoreMessage.Type
Enum containing the possible types of score updates
UpdateScoreMessage.UpdateScorePayload
Specific payload for UpdateScoreMessage.
View
Abstract class View defines the methods that must be implemented by each view.
ViewMessage<Payload extends Serializable>
MVC view message parent class.
